name: inFilings
desc: inFilings was developed to be the leading technology solution that truly structures and normalizes abstract text from US SEC filings data. By leveraging proprietary software and in-house analytics, inFilings fundamentally changes how investors and analysts analyze 10-Ks, 10-Qs, IPO filings, and more. All of our products are delivered via a robust web platform, customizable email reports, and feeds via API and flat file formats.
top_tickers: AAPL, FDX, GE, MSFT, PRGO, PTC, SBUX, STMP, TSLA, WMT
data_delivery: Raw, Platform Based, Research Reports, Custom Analysis
why_us?: Enhanced due diligence by structuring SEC disclosures
